Introduction
This topic contains information about FPOW protocol examinations, including
reviewing FPOW claims
considerations when requesting an FPOW protocol examination
when to order initial FPOW protocol examinations
, and
how to order initial FPOW protocol examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C - Development and Examination Request for Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C
